item.title: Supercharge SageMaker with Deep Lake capabilities
item.description: Introduction Deep Lake can be integrated with Amazon SageMaker as a vector database, providing a storage solution for “embeddings” - vector representations of data used in deep learning models. This integration empowers developers to leverage Deep Lake’s vector database capabilities to accelerate the training and deployment of deep learning models. In this blog post, we will examine the specifics of this integration and explore how vector databases can improve the performance and accuracy of deep learning models.

item.title: Introduction to MLOps With SageMaker: Running your First LLM
item.description: Introduction As the field of machine learning advances, it has become increasingly important for organizations to develop robust practices for managing their workflows. That’s where MLOps comes in - a set of best practices and tools for managing the entire lifecycle of machine learning models, from development to deployment and beyond. In this blog post, we’ll delve into how MLOps practices can be leveraged to deploy an LLM in AWS SageMaker, using the popular Hugging Face Transformers library.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: I’m a scala developer by trade, so let’s say hello in rust! fn main() { println!("Hello World!"); }

item.description: I code by day and toy around with computers by night…
